All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alertmessages
    This class is a functional interface and allows for one abstract method named getAlert which is used in this application to provide alerts with different messages.
    AppointmentFormController
    This class is a controller used to control and manage the AppointmentsForm.
    Appointments
    This class is used as a value object for Appointments and provides POJO functions to handle and manage appointments.
    BuyerFormController
    This class is a controller used to control and manage the CustomerForm functions.
    Buyers
    The Buyers class is inherited from the Customers class and implements the type and propertyType to differentiate between the Sellers class.
    CalendarMonths
    This class is used to create an observable list of months to be displayed in a combo box
    CalendarWeeks
    This class is used to create a list of Calendar Week objects to be displayed in a combo box
    Contacts
    This class is used as a value object for Contacts and provides POJO reference types.
    Countries
    This class is a value object for Countries.
    CustomerAppointments
    This class is used to create an observable list of customerAppointments which is used to provide a report and allows for any POJO reference types.
    Customers
    This class is a value object for Customers and contains an observable list of customers to hold and manage POJO reference types.
    DateFormatting
    This class is used as a functional interface and allows for one abstract method which is used in this application to format a String to a specific date or time pattern.
    DateTimeConversions
    This class is used to convert dates and times in and out of the database
    DBAppointments
    This class is used to retrieve the appointments table from the database and place it into an observable arraylist.
    DBConnection
    This method is used to establish or close the connection to the database.
    DBContacts
    This class is used to retrieve the contacts table from the database and add it to an observable array list.
    DBCountries
    This class is used to retrieve the countries table from the database and add it to an observable arraylist
    DBCustomerAppointments
    This class is used to retrieve customer appointments from the appointments table and group them by type and month, specifically for the customerAppointments report.
    DBCustomers
    This class is used to retrieve the customers table from the database and add it to an observable arraylist.
    DBFirstLevelDivisions
    This class is used to retrieve the first_Level_Divisions table from the database and adds it to an observable arraylist
    DBQuery
    This method is used to set a preparedStatement Query for the database
    DBUsers
    This class is used to retrieve the users table in the database and adds it to an observable arraylist
    DirectoryFormController
    This class acts as a controller for the DirectoryForm.fxml document and controls all functions.
    FirstLevelDivisions
    This class is a value object for FirstLevelDivision and contains an observable arraylist of firstLevelDivisions for POJO reference types
    LoginFormController
    This class acts as a controller for the LoginForm.
    Main
    This is the main class.
    PropertyTypes
    This class creates and property type object and populates an observable arraylist of propertyTypes for a comboBox
    ReportFormController
    This class is a controller class and is used to control and handle the ReportForm.
    SellerFormController
    This class is a controller used to control and manage the CustomerForm functions.
    Sellers
    The Sellers class is inherited from the Customers class and implements the type and listingNumber to differentiate between the Buyers class.
    Times
    This class is used to construct an object of times to be populated and selected in combo boxes
    Translation
    This class is used to create an object for translating english to french
    Users
    This class is a value object for the Users and has an observable list of users for POJO reference types
